events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but want to request a refund because the size I ordered does not fit at all.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to keywords related to return and refund requests.
This case has been assigned to agent Lisa M., who specializes in handling refund requests and order issues.
Hello! Iâ€™m Lisa and I will assist you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, we need the order number and a brief reason why you are returning the jacket.
Sure, my order number is 4587321. The jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately once you send the jacket back using our prepaid return label.
That sounds good, thank you for helping me with the return and refund. I will send it back as soon as possible.
The refund request has been processed. You will receive a confirmation email once the jacket is received and the refund completes.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund process is complete and you did not request further assistance, we are closing this support case now.
Please check your email for the customer satisfaction survey to provide feedback on how we handled your refund request.
